title: Slayers Great (Dub)
alternative_title: Slayers Movie 3, スレーヤーズぐれえと
description: Laia Einburg wants for her father Galia, who is a talented golom maker, and her equally ambitious brother Huey to end a long running feud. But her luck changes for the worse when Lina Inverse and Naga the Serpent save Laia from a rampaging golem.
